document_data.name: Memphiria
document_data.mainbody: '''Memphiria''' was the [[divine domain]] of the [[Pharaonic pantheon|Pharaonic]] and [[Mulhorandi pantheon|Mulhorandi]] [[deity]] of death, [[Osiris]].

Cosmology.Planar Traits: In the Great Wheel cosmology, [[undead]] were deprived of their special innate abilities while in Memphiria. For example, the [[mummies]] of this realm did not produce [[mummy rot]].

document_data.Geography: In both cosmologies Memphiria was a desert realm,
document_data.Notable Locations: * '''Memphiria''': A residential city built of white [[marble]], which was rather lacking in terms of goods and services. In the World Tree cosmology, it was said to be a grand necropolis surrounded by rows of mausoleums.

Inhabitants.Notable Inhabitants: * '''Khallis Mhektis''': The fair, wise, and impartial [[half-elf]] [[proxy]] of Osiris who ruled over the city of Memphiria. They had a sorrowful look to them and their only motivation was to serve Osiris well.
